Uses of Class
accounts.util.User

Packages that use User
Package
Description
accounts.ui
This package provides user interfaces for logging in and account management.
administration.ui
Contains pages relevant to the administration and moderation of the workspace.
databasePart1
Contains the interface between the H2 database and the CSE360Monday25 Q and A application.
messaging.ui
This package contains the UI pages related to direct message functionality.
questions.ui
Contains the UI pages for functionality related to questions, answers, and reviews.
questions.util
Contains backend classes needed for questions, answers, and reviews.
taskmessaging.ui
 
test.questions.util
Contains unit tests for functionality related to asking and answering questions.
